images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Spain in autumn, featuring warm colors, inviting landscapes, and cultural elements like autumn leaves and food festivals.
AI-selected These promotional icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the campaign, making it easier for users to navigate and understand the offers related to autumn travel in Spain.

AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trust, aligning with the overall campaign theme.

assetRequirements.content_context: depicting golden sunsets, cultural festivals, and a relaxed atmosphere in Spain

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Испания ждет вас осенью!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Spain in autumn, featuring warm colors, inviting landscapes, and cultural elements like autumn leaves and food festivals.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
